name: Hammer Time! (itch)
description:
A little lead ball has roused the ire of Thunderhead Volca, the Thunder God of Volcanoes. Overreacting to the slight, the hammer of Thunderhead tries to smash the ball into the magma.

It's Hammer Time!

A competitive local-multiplayer for two or more players. The player controlling the ball with the arrow keys/WASD must try to stay on the platforms for as long as possible - the player controlling the hammer must smash the platforms to send the ball into the volcano.

After one round, the players swap controls and compete for the best time. The player who remained on the platforms for the longest wins the game.
